column4: Percentage of population in the lowest two wealth quintiles *
column5: Percentage of elected women over total seats in the State/UT (Lok Sabha elections)
column6: Percentage of seats held by women in Panchayati Raj Institutions (PRIs)
column7: Percentage of SC/ST seats in State Legislative Assemblies **
column8: Ratio of transgender  to male Labour Force Participation Rate (LFPR)
column9: Rate of total crimes against SCs (per 1,00,000 SC population)
column10: Rate of total crimes against STs (per 1,00,000 ST population)

column8: 5th Employment-Unemployment Survey, Labour Bureau,Ministry of Labour and Employment

column4: * This indicator is not used to compute the national score under SDG 10
** This indicator is not used in  computation of the Index due to lack of uniform target for all States/UTs
